statements: DELETE FROM EnergyConsumptionPatterns WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND energy_consumed > 1000
DELETE FROM power_usage WHERE device_id = 1 AND usage_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE device_id = 1 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Device WHERE smart_home_id = (SELECT smart_home_id FROM SmartHome WHERE location = 'New York') OR device_id IN (SELECT device_id FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_consumed > 100);
DELETE FROM DeviceStatus WHERE status_id = 20 AND device_id = 5;
DELETE FROM energy_usage WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND energy_consumed > 1000;
DELETE FROM power_optimization WHERE device_id='98765432-1111-2222-3333-123456789abc' AND optimization_date='2022-12-31';
